input:
Context: 'That will be very unfair of you. How am i going to survive without water or food?' 'You have food and water, this is just extra supplies' 'I know but with my condition i may not make it, especially without more water.😮'
Utterance: 'you can make water by boiling water with all that extra firewood you got'

Context: 'How are you enjoying the camping trip so far?' 'Hi. It’s great, but very cold here. How about you? '
Utterance: 'Yes the cold is hard to adjust to I can't seem to shake the chill.'

Context: 'I will provide you the food, but I am asking only one for my people.' 'I am giving you all the water,  how come you need the food? ' 'The main reason is to prevent us from cold.  Please provide three wood and three water.  If this is okay, then I will provide you three food.'
Utterance: 'Food doesn't prevent cold. Thank you for giving me all the food but I need 1 wood to cook the additional food. You still end up with more items in the  end  '
